publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5483.1 Robin Harper: Construction of National Indoor Sports Arena and Sir Chris Hoy Velodrome and Sports Arenaâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-5483) in the name of Bill Kidd, insert at end "and considers that the velodrome in Edinburgh should remain open until a covered alternative is provided in the grassroots home of Scottish track cycling".
